name: PCCommander
0:
”Alexa, open my computer”
”Alexa, push my custom command using my computer”
”Alexa, ask my computer how many pushes i sent”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my computer
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With PC Commander, push commands via the Pushbullet service to your PC via a listener program of your choice. We recommend Push2Run as an excellent option.

You'll need to use the Alexa app to enable this skill. Once enabled, you'll need to perform the account linking to access the core functionality.

After every push, Alexa will inquire, “Anything else?” If you prefer one-off commands, disable follow-up mode by saying “toggle follow-up mode.“

By default, after each interaction, Alexa responds in a detailed manner. However, if you prefer concise chimes for common responses, simply say “toggle brief mode.”

If you have any difficulties in getting this skill to work for you, please check our guide at https://pccommander.net/howto/
